summary: Diff implements a centralized Vedika Pawar identity object and updates header, footer, and key pages (Home/About, Contact, Education, Skills, Gallery) to use that identity, remove footer platform branding, and keep the five-page navigation/contact form structure. Some additional unrequested styling/theme changes appear to have been introduced.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual re-theming to a "warm terracotta and cream OKLCH color palette" and related Tailwind theme/font changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on personalization and removing caffeine.ai branding; it does not request a new color palette or font/theme adjustments.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/src/index.css warm terracotta/cream palette and frontend/tailwind.config.js Inter font + extended theme tokens)
